document_title: Grade 1 fatty liver: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
Because it is mild, most level 1 fatty liver disease has no obvious symptoms. Normally, patients can only detect the disease through diagnostic tests during health checks.
If there are symptoms, people with grade 1 fatty liver disease may often feel more tired, lose their appetite or feel nauseous, etc. These signs are often easily confused with many other diseases. . It is best to see a doctor early to get timely treatment if they have fatty liver.
